hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "None of you should spit in front or on his right but he could spit either on his left or under his foot

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَبْصُقْ عَنْ يَمِينِهِ، فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It is forbidden to spit on the right side while in Salat (prayers)
